autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: through a mindset that assumes personal efforts are solely responsible
presumption.question: Did I take for granted the blessings in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence through a mindset that assumes personal efforts are solely responsible?
presumption.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I harbored a grudge against others' blessings, secretly wishing they would lose them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking to others using language that was vulgar or hurtful , thereby violating their dignity
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking to others using language that was vulgar or hurtful, thereby violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking words that lacked reverence for others
in social conversations or community events
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in speaking words that lacked reverence for others, especially when engaging in social conversations or community events?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
to maintaining my physical health and well - being
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, especially when it comes to maintaining my physical health and well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
in leisure activities like fishing , golfing , or gardening
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when engaging in leisure activities like fishing, golfing, or gardening?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I recklessly jeopardized my financial resources, thereby undermining my ability to provide for my family's needs through excessive and wasteful gambling?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: to family members or those in genuine need
prodigality.question: Have I excessively used my resources for personal indulgences, thereby compromising my financial obligations to family members or those in genuine need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing faults or private affairs about my friends , acquaintances , or colleagues
about my friends , acquaintances , or colleagues
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing faults or private affairs about my friends, acquaintances, or colleagues, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own entertainment or pride
gossip.question: Have I spoken ill of others, even if what was shared was true, for my own entertainment or pride?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I shared others' private affairs for my own amusement, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

defraud.question: Did you use your Sunday for personal gain when it could have been dedicated to rest, worship, or spending time with family?
defraud.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
